inclusion.criterion: non-functioning, prolactin secreting, growth hormone secreting, gonadotropin secreting, or TSH secreting hormone
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Cushing's Disease (pituitary tumor which secretes ACTH)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with a history of pituitary apoplexy (condition caused by hemorrhage into a pituitary adenoma which causes headache, double vision and hypopituitarism)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients on long term glucocorticoid therapy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with adrenal insufficiency or who have not had their adrenal response evaluated prior to surgery
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a history of acromegaly due to pituitary adenoma and underwent transsphenoidal surgery 4 months ago. He takes only vitamin D and multivitamins after the surgery.
